typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		dwh_EmployeeKey as integer,
		dwh_BusinessEntityID as string,
		dwh_NationalIDNumber as string,
		dwh_LoginID as string,
		dwh_OrganizationNode as string,
		dwh_OrganizationLevel as string,
		dwh_JobTitle as string,
		dwh_BirthDate as string,
		dwh_inserted as string,
		dwh_lastUpdated as timestamp,
		dwh_HashValue as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	batchSize: 1,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM [dbo].[dimEmployee]',
	format: 'query') ~> dimEmployee
source(output(
		BusinessEntityID as string,
		NationalIDNumber as string,
		LoginID as string,
		OrganizationNode as string,
		OrganizationLevel as string,
		JobTitle as string,
		BirthDate as string,
		MaritalStatus as string,
		Gender as string,
		HireDate as string,
		SalariedFlag as string,
		VacationHours as string,
		SickLeaveHours as string,
		CurrentFlag as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as string,
		{_inserted} as timestamp,
		{_lastUpdated} as timestamp,
		StgHash as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	batchSize: 100,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	query: 'SELECT * FROM [dbo].[employee]',
	format: 'query') ~> StgEmployee
StgEmployee derive(StgHash = sha1(BusinessEntityID + NationalIDNumber + OrganizationNode)) ~> GenerateHashValue
GenerateHashValue, dimEmployee exists(GenerateHashValue@StgHash == dwh_HashValue,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'none')~> IsHashFound
IsHashFound, dimEmployee lookup(StgEmployee@BusinessEntityID == dwh_BusinessEntityID,
	broadcast: 'none')~> FindBusinessKey
FindBusinessKey derive(Str = 1 == 1,
	partitionBy('roundRobin', 2)) ~> AddInsertedUpdated
AddInsertedUpdated alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> Upsertif
Upsertif sink(input(
		dwh_EmployeeKey as integer,
		dwh_BusinessEntityID as string,
		dwh_NationalIDNumber as string,
		dwh_LoginID as string,
		dwh_OrganizationNode as string,
		dwh_OrganizationLevel as string,
		dwh_JobTitle as string,
		dwh_BirthDate as string,
		dwh_inserted as string,
		dwh_lastUpdated as timestamp,
		dwh_HashValue as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['BusinessEntityID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		dwh_EmployeeKey,
		dwh_BusinessEntityID = BusinessEntityID,
		dwh_NationalIDNumber = NationalIDNumber,
		dwh_LoginID = LoginID,
		dwh_OrganizationNode = OrganizationNode,
		dwh_OrganizationLevel = OrganizationLevel,
		dwh_JobTitle = JobTitle,
		dwh_BirthDate = BirthDate,
		dwh_inserted = {_inserted},
		dwh_lastUpdated = {_lastUpdated},
		dwh_HashValue = StgHash
	)) ~> sink1
